casebody.data:
TOWN OF APEX
v.
RUBIN 410P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 21, 2018 David P. Ferrell, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Town of Apex. Matthew Nis Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Kenneth C. Haywood, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Rubin, Beverly L.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of November 2018 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of November 2018."
